newsitem.title: EGYPT: 10 killed in bus-truck collision in Egypt.
newsitem.headline: 10 killed in bus-truck collision in Egypt.

text.p: Ten people were killed and 16 injured when a bus and a truck collided in southern Egypt on Thursday, government newspapers said on Friday.
The dead include the driver of the truck, Sabir Gamal Kabousha, 40, and six men aged between 35 and 48. Three of the bodies have not yet been identified.
The accident took place on the Cairo-Aswan road near the townn of Maghagha, in the Nile valley 150 km (90 miles) south of Cairo, the papers said.
